snippet.title: P.O.L.L.E.N Gameplay  Trailer
snippet.description:
P.O.L.L.E.N is a strikingly beautiful first-person space thriller where everything can be interacted with. Operate any object or machine and explore their hidden features as you expand the story inside the Research Station M.

Designed and optimised to be played on monitor or in Virtual Reality.

*********

Vote us on Steam Greenlight!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=527788650

*********
www.pollengame.com
https://www.facebook.com/mindfieldgames
https://twitter.com/mindfield_Games
